detail_desc: Gently flared, calf-length skirt in sturdy satin with a regular waist. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at one side. Unlined.
Short, A-line skirt with buttons down the front.
Swim shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Short, wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Sports bag in woven fabric with two handles, a detachable adjustable shoulder strap and a zip at the top. One zipped outer compartment and one zipped inner compartment. Padded base. Lined. Size 21x24x48 cm.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes with pendants, two of which are decorated with glass rhinestones.
Cap with a sweatband in a cotton weave and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge, cut-off hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ties at the hem.
Hat in soft, rib-knit cashmere with a roll edge at the hem.
Tube top in ribbed cotton jersey with elastication around the top.
T-shirt in airy cotton jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline, open chest pocket, sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves and a rounded hem.
Lace bra with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Slip-on trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Twill linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Skater skirt in soft cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Gently tailored pea coat in sturdy, felted fabric with a high collar, metal buttons at the front, shoulder tabs with metal buttons and welt side pockets. Lined.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Airy top in a fine-knit cotton and Tencel™ lyocell blend containing some silk with a deep, U-shaped neck and extra-long sleeves. Textured-knit vertical sections to create a gathered effect and raw, roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Short suede skirt with decorative seams. Visible zip at the back. Lined.
Long cardigan in a fine, rib-knit viscose blend with no buttons.
Shirt in soft cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke with a seam at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a curved hem.
Narrow belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
Thong briefs in soft lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.

Off-the-shoulder, long-sleeved dress in a patterned weave with elastication around the top and cuffs. Smocked seam at the waist with a drawstring and a gently flared skirt with a flounced hem. Unlined.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, an open chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Tie/bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and fastener at the back.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a round neck and all-over print. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Large bucket bag in hole-patterned imitation leather with two handles and a drawstring at the top and a detachable shoulder strap with carabiner hooks. Unlined. Size approx. 13x24.5x28 cm.
Narrow metal Alice band with bells on top.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and side pockets.
A-line skirt in soft cotton corduroy with two press-studs at the top and decorative buttons down the front. Unlined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Double elastic shoulder straps that cross at the back and an elasticated hem. Medium support.
Elasticated scrunchies in woven fabric with a decorative knot detail.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

Sleeveless top in woven fabric that is pleated all round. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed silicone trim at the top. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a concealed zip in one side.

Long dress in an airy weave with a wrapover front, hook-and-eye fastener at the neckline and a concealed zip in one side. Gathers at the shoulders and long balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Seam with a wide, pleated panel at the waist, and a flared, pleated skirt. Lined.
Shorts in woven fabric with an adjustable, elasticated waist and decorative drawstring. Zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Short-sleeved top in satin with a lace yoke and round neckline with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck. Straight-cut hem with slits in the sides.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with raw edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Narrow satin tie. Width 5 cm.
Hoop earrings in metal with beads made from reconstituted stones. Diameter 6 cm.
Long-sleeved top with a wide neckline.
Fine-knit hats in a cotton blend with roll edges.

Set with a top and pair of cycling shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Cycling shorts with an elasticated waist.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Shopper in soft imitation leather with a shimmering metallic finish. Two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top and one zipped inner compartment. Soft brushed inside. Size 20x29x39 cm.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in soft, striped organic cotton. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with concealed press-studs on the shoulders and a print motif and appliqués at the hem. Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.
Leather boots with a soft shaft at the top, round toes, a zip at the front with a decorative metal ring and covered block heels. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with asymmetric cut-outs at the hems. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
V-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Shorts in stretch denim with studs. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems.
T-shirt in soft cotton and modal jersey with a wide neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Marled sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric. Seamless.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with worn details, a high waist, button fly and slim legs.
Top in softly draping silk with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow shoulder strap and a zip at the top with a decorative bow and metal pendant. Base and sides in imitation suede. Lined. Size 7.5x22x17 cm.
Ankle-length trousers in a viscose weave with covered elastication, a small frill trim and decorative bow with tassels at the waist. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Fully lined bikini top with wide shoulder straps and an elasticated hem.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in soft, stretch twill made from a linen blend with a regular waist and a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem with creases and a slit at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long jacket in jersey with narrow notch lapels and front pockets. Unlined.
Metal chain bracelet with fixed pendants in various designs, two decorated with glass rhinestones. Adjustable length. The zinc content of the bracelet is recycled.
Top in Tencel™ lyocell denim with short cap sleeves, a V-neck with pin-tucks, and a gently rounded hem.

Top in a double layer of airy, crinkled chiffon with spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back. Small frill trim at the top, elastication at the top of the back and a decorative hole pattern at the hem. Lined.
5-pocket trousers in cotton twill in a regular fit with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud (button in sizes 8-10Y).
Fitted vest top in stretch cotton jersey.

Set with a shirt in soft cotton flannel and T-shirt in cotton jersey. Shirt with a collar, yoke at the back and buttons down the front. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a curved hem. Classic T-shirt with a ribbed neckline.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Scarf in patterned satin. Size 110x110 cm.

Short, lightly padded parka in cotton twill with an embroidered motif at the top, lined hood and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Flap side pockets with a concealed press-stud, long sleeves with shaping seams at the elbows and a press-stud at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Wide-fitting, sleeveless top in linen jersey with a gently rounded hem.
Bomber jacket in soft fabric. Small stand-up collar, concealed press-studs down the front and welt side pockets. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Soft, non-wired bandeau bra in jersey with a shimmering metallic finish, thin elastic shoulder straps and no fasteners.
Satin tie. Width 6.5 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).

Sleeveless dress in airy, patterned chiffon with flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Small opening with a button at the back of the neck, a seam with narrow elastication at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.

Tuxedo trousers in woven fabric with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Diagonal side pockets, fake jetted back pockets and legs with satin stripes down the sides and creases.
Short sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband containing a concealed key pocket.
Chunky metal chain bracelet, half in brushed metal and the other half in painted metal. Claw clasp.
